title: Minecraft Music Disc Replacement Tool (Bedrock Edition)

header.title: Minecraft Music Disc Replacement Tool (Bedrock Edition)

info.what_is_this: What is the purpose of this website?
info.what_is_this_desc: This website provides a function to generate Minecraft Bedrock Edition disc replacements
info.how_to_use_desc: Just upload audio in ogg format, please note the maximum supported duration below
info.why_cant_upload: Why can't I upload or download?
info.why_cant_upload_desc1: Please use a Chromium-based browser, such as Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge
info.why_cant_upload_desc2: Please ensure you upload the correct format
info.not_ogg_format: My audio format is not ogg, is there a tool to convert format?
info.thanks_desc: Thanks to this video for inspiring me and providing files

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.zh_q1: Q1：为什么我在物品栏里查了填入的自定义描述名查不到？
faq.zh_a1: A1：您需要输入的是"音乐唱片"（英：Music Disc、日：レコード），然后才能查找。
faq.en_q1: Q1: Why can't I find my custom description in the inventory search?
faq.en_a1: A1: You need to search for "Music Disc" (Chinese: 音乐唱片, Japanese: レコード) first, then you can find it.
faq.ja_q1: Q1：なぜインベントリ検索でカスタム説明を見つけることができないのですか？
faq.ja_a1: A1：最初に"レコード"（中国語：音乐唱片、英語：Music Disc）を検索する必要があります。その後、見つけることができます。

upload.title: Upload Music Files
upload.select_audio: Select audio (not uploading will keep the original music)
upload.duration_warning: The maximum duration for this music is
upload.custom_desc: Custom description (default is automatically filled with filename)
upload.slow_conversion: Not available, please use other online conversion tools
upload.image_size_modify: Enable item display image size modification
upload.pack_name_placeholder: If not entered, the name of the first uploaded file will be used
upload.item_image: Select Item Display Image (Keep original texture if not uploaded)
upload.audio_conversion_not_available: This feature is currently not available

notices.title: Notes
notices.notice1: Each music selection button has a duration limit indicated below it. If the uploaded music exceeds the limit, it will be forcibly stopped by the game
notices.notice2: Some browsers will add .zip to the end of the file name. If this happens, you need to remove it manually
notices.slow_conversion: The built-in audio format conversion tool will be relatively slow

tools.title: Format Conversion Tools
tools.description: If you want to upload a file that is not in .ogg format, the following online conversion tools are recommended:

background.notice: Background image source: Internet. If there is any infringement, please visit my personal website to get contact email

errors.no_files: Please upload at least one .ogg format file
errors.must_be_image: Selected file must be an image
errors.browser_not_support_conversion: Browser does not support audio conversion, will use original file directly
errors.audio_conversion_failed: Audio conversion failed, please ensure you upload a valid audio file
errors.file_processing_failed: File processing failed, please try again
errors.image_processing_failed: Image processing failed, please try again

modal.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
modal.confirm_cancel_message: Are you sure you want to cancel the current audio conversion?
